Plot: G.G. Sparrow faces off with her choir's newly appointed director, Vi Rose Hill, over the group's direction as they head into a national competition.
Title: Joyful Noise
Actors: Queen Latifah, Dolly Parton, Keke Palmer, Jeremy Jordan
tomatoConsensus: Joyful Noise's musical numbers are solidly entertaining, and it benefits from Queen Latifah and Dolly Parton's sizable chemistry; unfortunately, they aren't enough to make up for the rest of the film.
